references: K. S. Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), The Root Lattice A*n and Ramanujan's Circular Summation of Theta Functions, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 130 (2002), 1-8.

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
